responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: Insecure Direct Object Reference Vulnerability
    analysis: |
      The code does not properly validate user input when constructing LDAP search filters. This could allow an attacker to bypass security controls and access sensitive information.
    cwe: CWE-639
    function_names:
      - getPasswordResetToken
    filenames:
      - src/main/java/com/unboundid/webapp/ssam/SSAMController.java
    classification: slightly promising

  - headline: Sensitive Information Disclosure
    analysis: |
      The code does not properly handle exceptions and may expose sensitive information such as stack traces or error messages to the user. This could allow an attacker to gain valuable information about the application and its internals.
    cwe: CWE-209
    function_names:
      - handleWebApplicationException
    filenames:
      - src/main/java/com/unboundid/webapp/ssam/SSAMController.java
    classification: slightly promising

  - headline: Improper Input Validation
    analysis: |
      The code does not properly validate user input when creating new user entries. This could allow an attacker to inject malicious data into the LDAP directory.
    cwe: CWE-20
    function_names:
      - createUser
    filenames:
      - src/main/java/com/unboundid/webapp/ssam/SSAMController.java
    classification: slightly promising

  - headline: Potential CSRF Vulnerability
    analysis: |
      The code does not properly handle CSRF protection for certain sensitive actions, such as password changes and user deletions. This could allow an attacker to perform unauthorized actions on behalf of a legitimate user.
    cwe: CWE-352
    function_names:
      - updatePassword
      - deleteUser
    filenames:
      - src/main/java/com/unboundid/webapp/ssam/SSAMController.java
    classification: slightly promising

  - headline: Insecure Logging
    analysis: |
      The code does not properly handle sensitive information in log messages, which could lead to the exposure of sensitive data such as passwords or other user information.
    cwe: CWE-532
    function_names:
      - log
    filenames:
      - src/main/java/com/unboundid/webapp/ssam/SSAMController.java
    classification: slightly promising
```
